AudioProcessor.title: Local Audio Batch Processor
AudioProcessor.description: Process your audio files entirely in your browser using FFmpeg WASM. No uploads, secure and fast.
AudioProcessor.coreNotLoaded: FFmpeg core not loaded. Please wait...
AudioProcessor.step1Heading: What would you like to do?
AudioProcessor.step1Description: Choose an operation mode for your audio files
AudioProcessor.concatModeDesc: Add intro and/or outro audio to your files
AudioProcessor.trimModeDesc: Cut audio to a specific time range
AudioProcessor.introFileHint: This audio will be added to the beginning
AudioProcessor.outroFileHint: This audio will be added to the end
AudioProcessor.durationPlaceholder: e.g. 10 (leave empty for rest of audio)
AudioProcessor.step3Description: Choose the MP3 files you want to process
AudioProcessor.dropzoneText: Click to select or drag files here
AudioProcessor.step5Description: Your processed files are ready for download
